casebody.data:
CABARRUS COUNTY
v.
SYSTEL BUSINESS EQUIPMENT COMPANY, INC. No. 408P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. E. Fitzgerald Parnell, III, Cynthia L. Van Horne, Charlotte, for Systel Business Equipment Co. Fletcher L. Hartsell, Jr., Concord, Christy E. Wilhelm, for Cabarrus County.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 4th day of August 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2005."
